tumor_staging_system.name: tumor_staging_system
tumor_staging_system.description: Indicate the tumor staging system used to stage the cancer at the time of the diagnosis, prior to treatment

stage_group.name: stage_group
stage_group.description: Stage group of the tumor, as assigned by the reporting tumor_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumor stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.)

script:
(function validate(inputs) {
        let result = {valid: true, message: 'Ok'};

        const {$row, $name} = inputs;
        const $field = $row[$name];

        if(!$field){
            return result;
        }

        const isCancer = $row.is_cancer && $row.is_cancer.trim().toLowerCase() == "true";

        if ($field && !$row.tumour_staging_system) {
            result = {
                valid: false,
                message: `Please provide a value for the tumour_staging_system or leave stage_group blank`,
            };
        }

        if (isCancer && !$field) {
            result = {
                valid: false,
                message: `The stage_group mandatory if the is_cancer flag is set to 1/true`,
            };
        }

        if ($field) {
            let codeList = [];
            switch ($row.tumour_staging_system && $row.tumour_staging_system.trim().toLowerCase()) {
                case 'revised international staging system (riss)':
                    codeList = ['stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii'];
                    break;
                case 'lugano staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage iea',
                        'stage ieb',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iiea',
                        'stage iieb',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'st jude staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii', 'stage iv'];
                    break;
                case 'ann arbor staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iis',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiie',
                        'stage iiis',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ive',
                        'stage ivs',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'rai staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage 0', 'stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii', 'stage iv'];
                    break;
                case 'durie-salmon staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 1',
                        'stage 1a',
                        'stage 1b',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'figo staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iab',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'binet staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage a', 'stage b', 'stage c'];
                    break;
                case 'ajcc 8th edition':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 0',
                        'stage 0a',
                        'stage 0is',
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ia3',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage ic',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iia1',
                        'stage iia2',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iic',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiia1',
                        'stage iiia2',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiic',
                        'stage iiic1',
                        'stage iiic2',
                        'stage iiid',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage iva1',
                        'stage iva2',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ivc',
                        'occult carcinoma',
                        'stage 1',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'ajcc 7th edition':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 0',
                        'stage 0a',
                        'stage 0is',
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage ic',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iia1',
                        'stage iia2',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iic',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiic',
                        'stage iiic1',
                        'stage iiic2',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage iva1',
                        'stage iva2',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ivc',
                        'occult carcinoma',
                        'stage 1',
                    ];
                    break;
                default:
                    codelist = [];
            }

            if (!codeList.includes($field.trim().toLowerCase()) && codeList.length) {
                const msg = `'${$field}' is not a permissible value. When 'tumour_staging_system' is set to '${
                    $row.tumour_staging_system
                }', 'stage_group' must be one of the following: \n${codeList
                    .map((code) => `- "${code}"`)
                    .join('\n')}`;

                result.valid = false;
                result.message = msg;
            }
        }
        return result;
    })

meta.notes: This field is dependent on the selected tumor_staging_system

smoking_pack_years.name: smoking_pack_years
smoking_pack_years.description: Number of packs of cigarettes per day multiplied by the number of years donor smoked

meta.notes: Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes (20 cigarettes per pack) smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

submitter_phenotype_id.name: submitter_phenotype_id
submitter_phenotype_id.description: Unique identifier of the phenotype, assigned by the data provider

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

phenotype_HPO_term.name: phenotype_HPO_term
phenotype_HPO_term.description: Term used for the phenotype in the Human Phenotype Ontology terminology

meta.notes: Refer to the Human Phenotype Ontology at https://hpo.jax.org/app/ for code identification.

phenotype_HPO_category.name: phenotype_HPO_category
phenotype_HPO_category.description: Term used for the phenotypic abnormality category in the Human Phenotype Ontology terminology

meta.notes: Refer to the categories of the Phenotypic Abnormality Subontology of the HPO (HP:000018) https://hpo.jax.org/app/browse/term/HP:0000118

phenotype_severity.name: phenotype_severity
phenotype_severity.description: Indicate the intensity or the degree of a manifestation

French Canadian trace their ancestry to French colonists who settled in Canada, English Canadians are of English ethnic origin and heritage.

vital_status.description: Participant's last known state of living or deceased
vital_status.name: vital_status

cause_of_death.description: Indicates the cause of a participant's death
cause_of_death.name: cause_of_death

meta.notes: Cause of death is only required to be submitted if the participant's vital_status is 'Deceased'.

age_of_death.description: Participant's age (in days) at the time of death
age_of_death.name: age_of_death

meta.notes: Age_of_death is only required to be submitted if the participant's vital_status is 'Deceased'.
